title: Birds and Us: A 12,000-Year History from Cave Art to Conservation
content: Birds and Us: A 12,000-Year History from Cave Art to Conservation by Birkhead.Tim2022. Princeton University Press, Princeton, New Jersey, USA. 496 pp., 63 color + 70 b/w illustrations, 2 maps. $35.00 (hardcover). ISBN 9780691239927. $35.00 (ebook). ISBN 9780691239941.
